00040 #define XML_CAVECANEM_MAX_NUMBER_OF_NON_EXTENSION_TAGS 1000
00041 #define DTD_CAVECANEM_LINE_NUMBER 13
00042 #define DTD_CAVECANEM_EXTENSION_NUMBER 12
00043 #define DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_LINE_NUMBER 354
00044 #define DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_EXTENSION_NUMBER 11

00052 struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement {
00053     /* Attributes of the element (object attribute tag) */
00054     char **attr;
00055     /* Number of attributes of the element */
00056     int attr_length;
00057     /* Text within the 'start tag' and the 'end tag' of the element */
00058     char *element_text;    
00059     /* Tag name of the element */
00060     char *tag_name;
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00069 struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject{
00070     /* Base class. */
00071     struct DDS_XMLObject base; /* Should be the first */
00072     /* Attributes of the object tag */
00073     char **attr;
00074     /* Number of attributes of the element */
00075     int attr_length;
00076     /* Index for next available place in the tagElements array */
00077     int current_element_index;
00078     /* Array for the elements (object attribute tags) of the object tag */
00079     struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement * tag_elements[XML_CAVECANEM_MAX_NUMBER_OF_NON_EXTENSION_TAGS];
00080 };
